SELECT DISTINCT a.attr_id,a.category_id,a.input_style,am.foreign_name as attr_name, c.category_name, am.lan_id FROM own.attribute as a, own.category as c , own.attributemultilanguage as am where a.is_search_attr = 1 and a.category_id = c.category_id and am.attr_id = a.attr_id and am.lan_id = #{lanID} and a.category_id = #{categoryID}
